channel.title: Docs on Queer Healing Resources
channel.description: Recent content in Docs on Queer Healing Resources

item.title: San Francisco resources
item.description: Trauma-informed spiritual groups SF Dharma Collective SF Zen Center GLIDE radically inclusive church (there are many more) Immersion Learning & Retreat Centers 1440 Multiversity - Santa Cruz Esalen Institute — Big Sur holistic alternative retreat center Spirit Rock — Marin Insight meditation center Green Gulch Farm — Marin Deer Park Monastery — Escondido, CA — Thich Nhat Hanh’s monestary in the US HIV/AIDS Support SF AIDS Foundation The Shanti Project

item.title: Trans* & Genderqueer Resources
item.description: Trans 101 Check out the excellent Trans 101 YouTube series. Identity Nonbinary Flowchart — what’s my gender? Changing ID Documents US resource guide — how to change your papers, for every state in the US UK Gender Recognition Certification Canadian Passport gender change guide Health Insurance in the US Transcend Legal videos on how to get trans healthcare covered. Hormones Hormones: A Guide for FTMs Hormones: A Guide for MTFs
